Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: The path continues to the east and west, circling the grounds.
Room.LongDescription: The the northeast and to the west you see the commoner's cemetery, where many a citizen has been buried. Oceancrest believes in honoring the dead. To the south you get a glimpse of the mausoleum, which some say has been taken over by evil forces. You are warned to stay away. To the southwest are the great burual vaults, which serve as a monument to Onydonn.
